roleDescriptions.Dealer: The Killers of the game. Work together to eliminate Party Animals without getting caught.
roleDescriptions.PartyAnimal: Innocent party people trying to survive as many nights as possible.
roleDescriptions.Medic: Choose at game start: RECUSITATE (single-use revive) or PROTECT (nightly block). Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.Bouncer: Check one player's ID each night (Dealer or Party Animal). Can steal Roofi powers if correctly identified. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.TeaSpiller: When killed, exposes one player's alignment (Dealer or Not). Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.Wallflower: Can observe murders discreetly but must hint without revealing what they saw. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.MessyBitch: Talks smack and blames others. Goal: survive by any means. No alliance.
roleDescriptions.Clinger: Must vote same as partner unconditionally. If discovered, dies. Alliance: partner's.
roleDescriptions.Creep: Pretends to be another Party Animal role. Dies if original role dies. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.Roofi: Paralyzes one player each night (no speaking/moving). If target is Dealer, Dealer also paralyzed next night. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.Lightweight: Each night, host points to someone whose name becomes taboo. If Lightweight says taboo name, they die. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.Predator: When voted to death, chooses one voter to kill with them. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.Minor: Cannot die until Bouncer IDs them. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.Sober: Once per game, can send a player home for the night (immune). If used, no murders that night. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.SeasonedDrinker: Has extra immunity lives (1 per Dealer). Each kill attempt reduces lives by 1. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.SecondWind: When killed, can convince Dealers to convert into a Dealer (revives as Dealer, no kills that night). Alliance starts Party Animals, changes to Dealers if converted.
roleDescriptions.DramaQueen: When killed, can swap two players' cards once on a later night and view them. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.ClubManager: Each night, inspects one player's role privately. No alliance (self-survival only).
roleDescriptions.SilverFox: Once per game, forces a player to reveal their card for 5 seconds. Alliance: Party Animals.
roleDescriptions.AllyCat: Observes Bouncer ID checks and communicates using 'Meow' only. Has 9 lives. Alliance: Party Animals.
